dmca.title: Copyright Infringement On Server
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Jim [mailto:sales@uniquebee.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2007 8:58 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Infringement On Server

Hello, I am the owner of "uniquebee.com" and I would like to report
copyright infringement.

This website: "adderwarlock.com" (70.86.48.66) has infringed my
copyrighted work.

Proof. Just view his HTML source code and do a find for "uniquebee.com".
This guy even forgot to remove my URL from the HTML after he stole my
code
and graphics. Please take down his website.

1) Detailed identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been
infringed upon:

http://www.uniquebee.com/thanks.php (My Website Design Layout and
Graphics/Art)

2) Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the
copyrighted work:

Website graphics located at this domain: adderwarlock.com

3) Location of the author copyright notice (for information).

http://www.uniquebee.com/thanks.php (bottom of the page)

4) sales@uniquebee.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described
above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my registered
copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the
information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright
owner of an exclusive right that is infringed.

James P Malloy

-- 
Best Regards,
Jim
UniqueBee Customer/Sales Support
sales@uniquebee.com
http://www.uniquebee.com/doc.php
